intro: Centrostemma yunnanense, commonly known as Yunnan starflower, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Polemoniaceae and is characterized by its showy, five-petaled flowers that typically bloom in shades of blue or purple. The plant is herbaceous, with slender stems and lance-shaped leaves that are often covered in fine hairs. It thrives in moist, well-drained soils and is often found in mountainous regions. Due to its ornamental value, it is occasionally cultivated in gardens, though it remains relatively rare in cultivation.
